name: Portal Packer
description:
You find yourself in an old rusted laboratory with seemingly no way out. Will you be able to escape using a backpack and some teleportation technology?

Created in 10 days for the MashUp Game Jam 2022 using the Game Randomizer!
https://itch.io/jam/mashup-game-jam-2022
https://mashupgames.itch.io/game-randomizer
